results.name: Directions of the lines in the (Heighway) Dragon Curve.
link: Joerg Arndt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16383
Joerg Arndt, Matters Computational (The Fxtbook), pp. 88-92; image of the dragon curve on p. 89 (top): 0 for north, 1 for west, 2 for south, and 3 for east.
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 08 2014
